footer.aboutText1: Musaned helps families in the UAE hire trusted domestic workers with clear documentation, MOHRE-compliant contracts, transparent support and ongoing guidance at every step.
footer.aboutText2: Whether you need flexible help, a temporary live-in worker or full sponsorship transfer, we ensure a smooth, compliant experience.
footer.copyright: Â© 2025 Musaned â€¢ All Rights Reserved

servicesPage.pageIntro: Musaned offers flexible, temporary and traditional domestic worker solutions with MOHRE-compliant contracts, clear terms and ongoing support for your family.

flexible.lead: Pay-as-you-go help for homes that need short-term or rotating support â€“ ideal if your needs change week to week or you want to test support before committing.

card1.title: Daily Home Help
card1.desc: A full day of help for cleaning, laundry and general housework.
card1.item1: Professional housekeeper for a single day
card1.item2: Ideal for deep cleaning, move-in / move-out, or guests
card1.note: Tell us your preferred days and timings â€“ we'll match a worker to your family.

card2.title: Weekly Schedule
card2.desc: The same worker on fixed days each week, so your home stays on track.
card2.item1: Set recurring days and hours (e.g. 3Ã— per week)
card2.item2: Helps with regular cleaning, ironing and basic support
card2.note: Perfect for apartments and villas that need regular support but not a full-time live-in.

card3.title: Monthly & Longer Flexible
card3.desc: Ongoing flexible help for homes that want routine support without a long contract.
card3.item2: Same worker assigned as consistently as possible
card3.item3: Support for cleaning, light cooking and household tasks
card3.note: We'll tailor the schedule and nationality options to your family's needs.

flexible.cta: Talk to us about Flexible Packages

temporary.lead: Live-in domestic workers under Musaned sponsorship for up to 2 years. We handle all documentation, visas, medicals, health insurance and salary processing â€“ so your family gets reliable support without the admin headache.

card1.title: Fully Managed Sponsorship
card1.desc: We remain the sponsor and take care of every legal and financial detail.
card1.item2: Visa processing, entry permits and renewals handled by Musaned
card1.item3: Healthcare, medicals and insurance arranged for the worker
card1.item4: Salary processing and documentation managed through us
card1.note: Your role is to welcome her into your home and treat her well â€“ we take care of the paperwork and ongoing compliance.

card2.title: Smooth Onboarding & Follow-up
card2.desc: From the time you choose a profile until she settles into your routine, our team stays involved.
card2.item1: Profile selection and matching based on your household needs
card2.item2: Clear expectations explained to both family and worker
card2.item3: Support during the first months to ensure a good fit
card2.item4: Replacement options available according to package terms
card2.note: We guide you through each step so you always know what is happening.

card3.title: Peace of Mind for Your Family
card3.desc: Temporary packages are ideal if you want full-time help, but prefer Musaned to remain responsible for documentation and payments.
card3.item1: No need to navigate government systems or labour portals alone
card3.item2: Transparent explanation of rights, duties and timelines
card3.item3: Local support team in the UAE if you have questions or issues
card3.note: You focus on your family â€“ we focus on making sure everything is compliant and up to date.

traditional.lead: Full sponsorship transfer to your family, with Musaned guiding you through recruitment, documentation and arrival so everything is compliant from day one.

card1.title: New Recruitment
card1.desc: Hire a worker from abroad under your own sponsorship with Musaned managing the process.
card1.item1: End-to-end recruitment coordination with licensed partners
card1.item3: Guidance on arrival, medicals and Emirates ID steps
card1.note: Best for families planning long-term support and wanting a fresh recruitment.

card2.title: Transfer of Sponsorship
card2.desc: Move an existing worker's sponsorship into your name with clear paperwork and timelines.
card2.item1: Support with approvals, contracts and documentation
card2.item2: Clear explanation of fees, timelines and obligations
card2.item3: Arabic & English support throughout the process
card2.note: Ideal if you've already found someone and need a clean, legal transfer.

card3.title: Advisory & Compliance Support
card3.desc: Already have a worker but need clarity on MOHRE rules or next steps?
card3.item1: Advice on contract renewal, end-of-service and exits
card3.item2: Guidance on rights, responsibilities and documentation
card3.item3: Helps avoid costly mistakes or non-compliance
card3.note: Speak to us before making changes â€“ we'll walk you through the safest route.

roles.lead: Every family is different. Musaned can match you with workers whose experience fits what your home needs most â€“ from childcare and cleaning to cooking and elderly support.

card1.title: Childcare Nanny
card1.desc: For families with babies or young children who need an extra pair of hands.
card1.item1: Support with feeding, bathing and bedtime routines
card1.item2: Light playtime and supervision at home
card1.item3: Can combine with basic household tasks
card1.note: Tell us your children's ages and daily routine â€“ we'll suggest suitable profiles.

card2.title: Housekeeper / Cleaner
card2.desc: For villas and apartments that need consistent cleaning and organisation.
card2.item1: Daily cleaning, dusting, mopping and laundry
card2.item3: Can work in flexible, temporary or traditional packages
card2.note: Ideal if your main priority is a clean, well-maintained home.

card3.title: Cook / Home Chef
card3.desc: For families that want regular help with cooking and kitchen preparation.
card3.item1: Meal preparation, light cooking and kitchen clean-up
card3.item2: Support with grocery organisation and basic planning
card3.item3: Can combine with light housekeeping, depending on your needs
card3.note: Let us know your preferred cuisine and meal times so we can match accordingly.

card4.title: Elderly Care Companion
card4.desc: For elderly parents or relatives who need patient daily support at home.
card4.item1: Companionship, light assistance and household help
card4.item2: Support with daily routines (as agreed) â€“ non-medical
card4.item3: Works alongside your family's existing medical care
card4.note: We discuss your relative's condition and build a realistic support plan together.
